definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Mother is disclined towards a long distance move.
I'm speaking to you at the end of a long trip.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一次遠途出訪的結尾對你們發表演講。

sentences.english: I remember going on a big journey with my family when I was 13 years old.
sentences.chinese: 還記得我十三歲時與家人去了一趟遠途旅行。

sentences.english: Or it may be that you will be finishing up a distant trip within your country - a good time to do so.
sentences.chinese: 或者你要在國內進行一個遠途旅行，這正是好時機。
